description.value:
You extend your aura in a sweeping pulse, searching for the faint signatures of life and power hidden in the unseen. Though this ripple reveals those who lurk in shadow, it also risks betraying your own presence.

Effect: You emit a pulse of Aura to locate nearby entities. Each undetected creature within range must make an @Check[will|against:aura-control|rollerRole:target] saving throw against your Aura-Control DC.

  • Critical Success: The creature resists your probing aura. Its concealment remains unchanged.

  • Success: The creature’s concealment is reduced by one step (e.g., from Undetected to Hidden, or from Hidden to Concealed).

  • Failure: The creature’s concealment is reduced by two steps.

  • Critical Failure: The creature’s concealment is reduced by three steps, potentially leaving it fully revealed.

Levels of concealment: Undetected --> Hidden —> Concealed

Range:

  • Expert: 30 feet.

  • Master: 60 feet.

  • Legendary: 90 feet.

Aura Attack: actions with this trait are subject to a multiple aura-attack penatly accumulated during a turn.
